name: Sand Strike
text: You can incorporate sand as part of your unarmed fighting techniques.
prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, dwarf, proficiency with the cestus.
benefit: You can take 1 minute to tightly embed sand into the joints and crevices of a pair of cestuses you wear. While they have sand embedded in them, the cestuses gain +1 hardness and +5 hit points. While wearing cestuses embedded with sand, you can perform a dirty trick combat maneuver to blind a foe in place of one of your melee attacks without provoking an attack of opportunity. Doing so causes the cestuses to no longer have sand embedded in them.
